definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: :Pr 17:1 fragment, bit, morsel of bread;—abs. [[תֲרֵבָה]] ´[[פ]] Pr 17:1 a dry morsel; cstr. [[פַּת־לֶחֶם]] Ge 18:5, Ju Jdg 19:5, 1Sa 2:36, 1Sa 28:22, 1Ki 17:11, Pr 28:21; sf. [[פִּתִּי]] Job 31:l7, [[פִּתְְּ]] Pr 23:8, [[פִּתֵּח]] Ru 2:14, [[פִּתּוֹ]] 2Sa 12:3; pl. [[פִּתִּים]] Le 2:6, Le 6:14; in sim. Ps 147:17.
